content.raw:
That would be awesome, but we don't have code that clever, at least yet.

If you look into the changelog list for that build in the [build main page](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat4-windows7-amd64/21/) you will see that it is detecting changes in default branch. It should not happen. It is testing changes in default branch instead of sdformat4 branch. Let me fix the problem.
